sentence.Network_en: Correct speech is an earmark of the educated man.
sentence.Network_cn: 正确的谈吐是受教育者的特征.

sentence.Network_en: I will earmark this money for your research.
sentence.Network_cn: 我将为你的研究指拨一笔款项.

sentence.Network_en: He also undertook to earmark $ 235 billion in government expenditure on infrastructure projects within five years.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时承诺在五年内投资二千三百五十亿元进行基建.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国政界常见的“专项拨款（earmark）”和“猪肉桶（pork barrel）”现象，就是政客回报自己选区的特定选民的手段。《独裁者手册》列 …
会计英语-财务财经词条 ... 1362 dynamic ysis 动态分析 1364 earmark 指定用途,专款专用 1365 earmarked loan 用贷款.
early 早的earmark 耳号earmuff 御寒耳罩
early-time portion 早期段earmark 记号；打上记号earn 挣得

entry.tran: 指定（款项等）用作特定用途
entry.def: If resources such as money are earmarked for a particular purpose, they are reserved for that purpose.

example.ex: ...the extra money being earmarked for the new projects...
example.tran: 指定用于新项目的额外资金

example.ex: The education department has earmarked £6m for the new school...
example.tran: 教育部为这所新学校划拨了600万英镑的专款。

entry.def: If something has been earmarked for closure or disposal, for example, people have decided that it will be closed or got rid of.

example.ex: Their support meant that he was not forced to sell the business which was earmarked for disposal last year...
example.tran: 他们的支持意味着他不必被迫出售去年已决定要卖掉的公司。

example.ex: The pit was one of the 31 earmarked for closure by the Trade and Industry Secretary.
example.tran: 这是工贸大臣明确指出要关闭的31个矿井之一。

means.word_mean: 1. identification mark on the ear of a domestic animal
1. give or assign a share of money or time to a particular person or cause;

sentences.sentence: "I will earmark this money for your research"

auth_sentence.content: Who fought against wasteful and earmark spending?
auth_sentence.res_content: Who fought against wasteful and earmark spending?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who fought against wasteful and earmark spending?

auth_sentence.content: For example, some members of Congress post some earmark requests online.
auth_sentence.res_content: For example, some members of Congress post some earmark requests online.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For example, some members of Congress post some earmark requests online.

auth_sentence.content: I'm also calling on Congress to continue down the path of earmark reform.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm also calling on Congress to continue down the path of earmark reform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm also calling on Congress to continue down the path of earmark reform.
